titleStmt.title: At the court at Whitehall the fifteenth day of May, 1672 present the Kings Most Excellent Majesty, Lord Archbishop of Canterbury [and 18 others]
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
Waterman, George.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Clark, printer to the honourable city of London ...,

notesStmt.note: Proclamation for regulation of coal shipping.
Contains at end of sheet the lord mayor's instruction to publish and enforce the proclamation, headed: Waterman, Maior.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
